--- 
+++ 
@@ -3,20 +3,21 @@
     <mat-card-title>Créer une Nouvelle Facture</mat-card-title>
   </mat-card-header>
   <mat-card-content>
     <form [formGroup]="invoiceForm" (ngSubmit)="onSubmit()">
-      <!-- Client Selection -->
-      <mat-form-field appearance="outline" class="form-field full-width">
-        <mat-label>Client</mat-label>
-        <mat-select formControlName="clientId">
-          <mat-option *ngFor="let client of clients" [value]="client.id">
-            {{ client.name }}
-          </mat-option>
-        </mat-select>
-        <mat-error *ngIf="invoiceForm.get('clientId')?.hasError('required') && invoiceForm.get('clientId')?.touched">
-          Le client est requis.
-        </mat-error>
-      </mat-form-field>
+      <div class="invoice-main-details">
+        <!-- Client Selection -->
+        <mat-form-field appearance="outline" class="form-field full-width">
+          <mat-label>Client</mat-label>
+          <mat-select formControlName="clientId">
+            <mat-option *ngFor="let client of clients" [value]="client.id">
+              {{ client.name }}
+            </mat-option>
+          </mat-select>
+          <mat-error *ngIf="invoiceForm.get('clientId')?.hasError('required') && invoiceForm.get('clientId')?.touched">
+            Le client est requis.
+          </mat-error>
+        </mat-form-field>
 
       <!-- Discount -->
       <mat-form-field appearance="outline" class="form-field">
         <mat-label>Remise (%)</mat-label>

@@ -17,16 +17,16 @@

-      <!-- Discount -->
-      <mat-form-field appearance="outline" class="form-field">
-        <mat-label>Remise (%)</mat-label>
-        <input matInput type="number" formControlName="discount" min="0" max="100">
-        <mat-error *ngIf="invoiceForm.get('discount')?.touched && invoiceForm.get('discount')?.invalid">
-          La remise doit être un nombre valide entre 0 et 100.
-        </mat-error>
-      </mat-form-field>
+     <!-- Discount -->
+        <mat-form-field appearance="outline" class="form-field"> <!-- Peut nécessiter un style pour la largeur si pas full-width -->
+          <mat-label>Remise (%)</mat-label>
+          <input matInput type="number" formControlName="discount" min="0" max="100">
+          <mat-error *ngIf="invoiceForm.get('discount')?.touched && invoiceForm.get('discount')?.invalid">
+            La remise doit être un nombre valide entre 0 et 100.
+          </mat-error>
+        </mat-form-field>
 
       <!-- Notes -->
       <mat-form-field appearance="outline" class="form-field full-width">
         <mat-label>Notes (Optionnel)</mat-label>
